Intro.introductionStatement: Front End React developer with 2+ years of experience in designing and building robust frontend applications. Proficient in React, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. Strong understanding of PostgreSQL for effective database management. Skilled in Software Testing techniques, ensuring high-quality web-based applications.

Experiences.Description: Florida ACCESS assists with Cal Fresh, Medi-Cal, CalWORKs, GA/GR etc. Users can apply, renew, appoint a representative, upload documents, report changes, and contact their caseworker.
Experiences.Responsibilities:
• FL SSP is a comprehensive platform facilitating access to social services.
  • Enables users to apply for benefits, renew existing ones, appoint representatives, upload documents, report changes, and communicate with caseworkers seamlessly.
  • Managed specific project components to ensure seamless integration with other modules, enhancing overall system efficiency.
  • Conducted rigorous ADA, NVDA, and Cross-Browser Testing to ensure the platformâ€™s accessibility for individuals with disabilities.
  • Proactively resolved ADA/UI defects, reducing technical debt by 45% and improving overall system reliability.
Experiences.Tools Used: Visual Studio Code, SourceTree, pgAdmin, Postman, Axe-dev tool, NVDA, Eclipse, FIGMA, Lambda Test

Experiences.Description: It is an Integrated Eligibility Project which encompasses both Customer Portal and a Worker Portal. It facilitates users in submitting appeals to the state regarding matters related to health benefits, SNAP, Medicaid, and similar issues.
Experiences.Responsibilities:
• Integrated Eligibility Project that encompasses both Customer and Worker Portal.
  • Facilitates users in submitting appeals to the state regarding health benefits, SNAP, Medicaid, and similar issues.
  • Enhanced user experience, contributing to a 20% increase in customer satisfaction ratings.
  • Integrated RESTful APIs, optimized data transfers, and employed asynchronous programming to improve data flow efficiency by 35%.
  • Proactively resolved ADA/UI defects, reducing technical debt by 45% and improving overall system reliability.
Experiences.Tools Used: Visual Studio Code, SourceTree, DBeaver, Postman, IntelliJ, Jaws

Experiences.Role: FRONT-END DEVELOPER AND FUNCTIONAL TESTER / MODULE OWNER Deloitte
Experiences.Description: HealthChoice provides comprehensive health and dental benefits. It is a State Based Market place which helps Customers to apply for Health Insurance and Shop for Plans if eligible.Workers and Issuers to manage Applications and Applicants.
Experiences.Responsibilities:
• HealthChoice is an Indian marketplace that helps customers search for health policies and check eligibility.
  • Developed compliant UI screens using React.js, reducing load times by 25%.
  • Implemented responsive design with media queries and Flexbox for multi-device use and optimized healthcare data processing with Redux.
  • Created comprehensive test plans and executed manual tests, ensuring 100% coverage.
Experiences.Tools Used: Visual Studio Code, SourceTree, JIRA, DBeaver, SoapUI, Jaws, Wave, Strapi
